content:
The russian army dropped explosives on the city of Beryslav, Kherson oblast, as a result of which two residents were injured.

About thisInformsKherson Regional Military Administration.

"As a result of another shelling of Beryslav, two local residents were injured. In the afternoon, the occupying forces dropped explosives from a drone on the city," the message reads.

As noted, two men, 33 and 38 years old, were injured. Now they are in the hospital, where they are receiving medical care.

Recall, occupiersDumpedFrom the drone explosive to the resident of Beryslav.
title: russia attacked Beryslav with drones again: there are casualties
description: This was reported by the Kherson Regional Military Administration.  "As a result of another shelling of Beryslav, two people were injured...
author: Army Inform
